awards.description: FTC Edison Division - FIRST World Championship
One of the only two representatives from Vietnam to compete at the FIRST Tech Challenge World Championship in Houston, USA.
FTC Vietnam - Ranked first in the competition across all robot performance metrics.

Business.name: Bronze ($200 - $999)
Business.desc:
• Use team’s and the web page’s content for media
• Certificate of appreciation
• 1:4 logo on teamwear and robot
• Name + logo on website and social media
• 1 media support post
• Other benefits enjoyed by both parties

Business.name: Silver ($1,000 - $1,999)
Business.desc:
All stated benefits, and:
• 1:3 logo on teamwear and robot
• Unique social media recognition
• 2 media support posts

Business.name: Gold ($2,000 - $2,999)
Business.desc:
All stated benefits, and:
• 1:2 logo on teamwear and robot
• 1:4 logo on event banners
• Name + logo on giveaway gifts
• 3 media support posts

Business.name: Diamond ($3,000 - $4,999)
Business.desc:
All stated benefits, and:
• 3:4 to 1:1 logo on teamwear and robot
• Recognition on ALL social media posts
• 2:3 logo on event banners
• Company merch handouts
• 3+ media support posts

Business.name: Partner ($5,000+)
Business.desc: For higher amount of sponsorship, we would want to be long-term strategic partners with the company and to satisfy more agreed-upon benefits over longer periods of time.

Individual.name: Backer ($200+)
Individual.desc:
All stated benefits, and:
• Recognition on website
• Social media recognition

faqs.q: How can other teams or partners collaborate with you?
faqs.a:
Teams and organizations can collaborate with us through mentorship, joint workshops, STEM events, sponsorship, or knowledge-sharing sessions.
We welcome partnerships that help strengthen Vietnam’s robotics community and inspire future innovators.

faqs.q: What is your goal for the current season?
faqs.a: We aim to continue improving our robot’s performance while expanding our impact on the FTC community in Vietnam. This includes mentoring new teams, hosting workshops, and promoting FIRST values among young STEM learners.

We are the FTC team of Hanoi–Amsterdam High School for the Gifted in Vietnam, and are a student-led robotics team focused on engineering, programming, and competing in both national and international FTC events.

faqs.q: How do you approach robot design to balance reliability, speed, and scoring efficiency?
faqs.a: We follow an iterative engineering process that includes careful planning, testing, and continuous improvement. Our robot design focuses on reliability, consistency, and effective performance in real match conditions. By reviewing match data, identifying weaknesses, and refining our mechanisms over time, we ensure that our robot stays stable, adaptable, and ready for competition.

faqs.q: What benefits do sponsors receive when partnering with you?
faqs.a: Sponsors gain visibility at events, on our robot uniforms, media platforms, and in international FTC competitions, along with opportunities to engage with STEM-focused students - visit our SPONSOR US page for more information.

missions.name: STEM Access
missions.desc: We aim to serve as a bridge bringing science and technology closer to Vietnamese students through various activities. We are dedicated to fostering an innovative and accessible learning environment.

missions.name: Innovation Focus
missions.desc: Our team pursues the "innovation first" spirit in every phase. We are committed to developing robots which compete effectively in arenas ranging from FTC Vietnam to the FTC World Championship.

missions.name: Community Growth
missions.desc: We aim to expand and strengthen the domestic FTC community by supporting new teams, creating open-source resources, organizing community events, and sharing competition experience.

missions.name: Collaboration & Impact
missions.desc: We consistently strive to build collaborative relationships to spread the spirit of FTC and robotics, through joint projects, long-term cooperation programs, and competitive, practical robotics products.

programming.quote: Code is poetry written in logic

business.name: Đức Hùng
business.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person

updates.title: Pushing Boundaries, One Robot at a Time
updates.description: From regional champs to world contenders — our team is redefining innovation, teamwork, and passion for STEM.

updates.title: Grateful to Our Sponsors for Powering the Journey
updates.description: A huge thank-you to the organizations and individuals who make our mission possible — your support drives every line of code and every match we play.

updates.title: Competition Season Kickoff
updates.description: Our team is gearing up for an exciting competition season. With new designs and improved strategies, we're ready to take on the challenge.

values.desc: We are one of the pioneer teams that join FTC in Vietnam, and we are into the feeling and soul that comes with it. Our value is to constantly explore, test unique robot solutions, and embrace failure as a chance to learn.

We view every opponent as a friend, willing to help and share experience even while competing. For GART, the goal isn't just for our robot to succeed, but for the entire robotics community to progress together.
We dedicate time to teaching and mentoring new teams, and sharing robotics stories with local youths. This is how GART proudly brings the image of Vietnamese passion and potential to the world stage.

visions.desc: We strive to be the embodiment of the FTC spirit - an inspiration to other teams - creating a journey filled with memorable and exciting experiences within the FIRST Tech Challenge.
We want our name to be synonymous with impact. When others speak of us, we want them to recognize a team fueled by a fierce competitive spirit and a burning passion for robotics.

To us, success is not defined merely by trophies or high rankings. True success lies in the breadth of our impact, the strength of our inspiration, and the positive influence we exert on the robotics community - contributing to its robust, sustainable, and long-term growth.
